donationCompleted.subject: Follow the Learners -- Your Donation is Filled!
donationCompleted.text:
Hi ${formattedName},
 Great news! Your donation has been completely filled with learners! Follow the link below and enter your email to see them all.
 Thank you for supporting Follow the Learners with your donation, if it's not too much to ask, please consider making another donation to bring reading into the lives of even more children!

${url}

Follow the Learners is currently in beta, and we're still ironing out some of the wrinkles! If you don't see your learners appear after about 5 minutes, please contact support@curiouslearning.org and we will be happy to assist you.
